subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Shawn Marion was traded Friday to the Toronto Raptors for Jermaine O’Neal, just more than a year after he was acquired from Phoenix for Shaquille O’Neal.
snippet: Shawn Marion was traded Friday to the Toronto Raptors for Jermaine O’Neal, just more than a year after he was acquired from Phoenix for Shaquille O’Neal.
